body.name: Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser - Daily Gentle Non-Stripping Face Wash Enriched with Matcha and Hemp Seed Oil, for All Skin Types, Vegan and Cruelty Free, 4.05 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 52 mins
features: 🧼 GENTLE, NON-STRIPPING CLEANSER: Your daily gentle face wash made for a feel good clean without the stripping.
💧HYDRATING FORMULA: Vitamin B5 and Sodium PCA put the "hydrating" in this cleanser. They help absorb moisture from the atmosphere while Hemp Seed Oil seals it in to keep your skin quenched.
🛡️ SKIN BARRIER FRIENDLY: Unlike other cleansers, our face wash doesn’t steal from your skin barrier. Instead, it donates skin-supporting nutrients like amino acids.
🐶 PETA-CERTIFIED VEGAN & CRUELTY FREE: Never tested on animals and formulated without any animal-derived ingredients.
🌎 GOOD FOR YOUR SKIN, GOOD FOR THE PLANET: Climate-neutral and plastic-neutral certified, and a portion of every dollar we make goes to conservation projects around the globe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Makeup Re-Wined Jelly Oil Cleanser Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser Kale-Lalu-yAHA AHA Exfoliator Great Barrier Relief Skin Barrier Repair Serum Oat So Simple Water Cream Beet the Sun SPF 40 PA+++ Sunscreen Step in the Routine 1. Oil-based cleanse 2. Water-based cleanse 3. Exfoliate 4. Repair 5. Moisturize 6. Protect Benefit Effortlessly removes makeup, sunscreen, and impurities. Gentle, non-stripping cleanse. Smooths out texture & fades discoloration. Restore damaged skin barrier and calms signs of sensitivity. Moisturizes and works well with targeted treatments in your routine. UVA/UVB protection and antioxidant properties to protect skin from the sun & other environmental aggressors. Texture jelly to oil silky & bouncy gel gentle liquid exfoliant creamy & nourishing serum watery & moisturizing cream lightweight & non-greasy sunscreen When to Use Night Day & night Night Day& night Day & night Day Skin Type All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types Vegan & Cruelty Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fill Weight 100 Ml / 3.38 Fl Oz 120 Ml / 4.05 Fl Oz 200 Ml / 6.76 Fl Oz 45 Ml / 1.52 Fl Oz 80 Ml / 2.7 Fl Oz 50 Ml / 1.7 Fl Oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best cleanser out there
reviews.reviewText: this is unlike any other cleanser i’ve ever tried— and believe me i’ve tried them ALL. from drugstore to high end. this is absolutely the most luxurious and deep cleansing face wash i’ve ever used. i love it i will never switch. it’s somewhat between a normal cleanser and a gel/oil cleanser but not greasy in any way. it smells fine and has a pretty green color from the matcha. it’s definitely the least stripping. leaves my skin feeling clean and renewed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my skin bouncy and soft
reviews.reviewText: Although this face wash doesn't foam very much, it still leaves my skin feeling clean but not dry. This is perfect for morning skincare, especially in a dry climate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Face wash out there!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and I have both been using this face wash for over 2 years now. It’s so gentle, yet cleans throughly. Will never be without!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser feels so nice on my dry skin, I haven’t used any cleanser that felt as soothing as this does. If you’re looking for a cleanser to remove makeup you may want to use a balm or micellar water before this cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy it is to use - the tiniest amount washes my face and neck. Gentle and moisturizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's pretty good
reviews.reviewText: My skin texture has improved for the little bit that I've used this! I wouldn't say it is the most moisturizing cleanser but a lot are not. It does take a little bit to wash it off but other than that it is pretty good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on skin
reviews.reviewText: This is my third bottle and I do love this cleanser. But not sure if the formula changed a little? I find my skin to be more dry at times and on some days more sensitive. I also prefer the old packaging because now the cleanser collects on the cap and it didn't do that with the old bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best cleanser I’ve tried
reviews.reviewText: I could probably wash my face 5x a day with this it’s amazing!!!! (Although you shouldn’t lol). It’s so gentle & I’m on accutane……
